returns._0: revenue Stake revenue distributed by shares amount

claim().notice: Claim revenue distributed by shareholder's staked shares amount

stake(uint256).notice: Stake shareholder's shares to revenue pool to get revenue, call by shareholder

unstake(uint256).notice: Unstake shareholder's shares from revenue pool to shareholder, call by shareholder

documentation.text:
@notice Get shareholder stake status
 @param shareholder Shareholder

@notice Stake shareholder's shares to revenue pool to get revenue, call by shareholder
 @param sharesAmount Shareholder's shares amount

@notice Unstake shareholder's shares from revenue pool to shareholder, call by shareholder
